constraints.name: ancestor_relationship
constraints.description: 节点之间的祖先关系必须满足题目描述中的定义，即如果A是B的祖先，则B不是A的祖先

constraints.name: single_father_constraint
constraints.description: 每个节点最多有一个父节点

constraints.name: gift_target_ancestor
constraints.description: 每个节点指定的礼物接收者必须是其祖先

constraints.name: unique_gift_target
constraints.description: 每个节点指定的礼物接收者唯一

constraints.name: pairwise_distinct_candidates
constraints.description: 候选列表中的节点必须两两不同

constraints.name: satisfy_all_wishes
constraints.description: 候选列表必须满足所有节点的礼物赠送愿望
